thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Rhett Thomas
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Rhett Thomas

author: Rhett Thomas
title: Rhett Thomas
text: A huge THANK YOU to Costa Rican Vacations for making my wife and I's honeymoon the very best it could have been! They got us booked up with two incredibly nice resorts, three beautiful and fun tours scheduled throughout the week, incredible food was included throughout most of the trip, and transportation was always super prompt which I greatly appreciate. The people of Costa Rica really made the trip such a joy but its the behind the scenes work of getting it set up that CRV and Leah Reeb had done that made it such a memorable time of our lives. Super thankful and will book with you guys again if we return to CR!
